Description: An Egyptian woman looking at herself in a hand mirror, standing, turned slightly to the left, running her hand through her hair. 1851/2 Lithograph on chine collé
Curator's comments: This print either belongs to the series 'L'Orient pittoresque' (1851-52) or 'Souvenirs d'Égypte' (1851-52), and may have featured in 'Les Souvenirs d'artistes' or 'Les Artistes anciens et modernes', as some plates were published in these art publications, as well as being in the set of 'L'Orient pittoresque'.
Bibliographic references: IFF / Inventaire du Fonds Français: Bibliothèque Nationale, Département des Estampes (17-18) (?)
Beraldi 1885-92 / Les Graveurs du dix-neuvième siècle (Vol. II, p. 73) (?)
